item.description: Practice 1 good Practice 2 bad，问题和昨天一样，还是要 先积累连接词，建立自己的词库 不断练习，筛选和更新词库 听回放，不断发现问题，继续练习

item.title: Day 4
item.description: Practice 1 对人，即有时间，说 availablle to；对物，说允许、有权限，说 available for 人称，从 I 变成了 we，要注意 最后总结句嘴飘了，说 I prefer watching movie better，应该是 I prefer watching movie at home better 另外老师建议结尾用 So，更自然 Practice 2 提升点： 表原因的连接词，只会 because 叙述没有转化成自己的语言，还是按照原文/听力的叙事，但60s肯定是说不完的，要自己过滤一遍精简 Practice 3 问题 原文没读完，不知道做哪些笔记 听力不知道记什么 这部分去听吴琦的在线课

item.title: Day 3
item.description: 一个问题： How to organize my language? 虽然他说不要有模板，但基本的结构我觉得还是得有，信口拈来会让人感到不知所云 如果是直接提问，就直接回答。 XXX agree/disagree with the idea According to the proposal, … (两个理由) But the man/woman opposed the idea, … (理由) 如果是开放性提问，比如： “Summarize the proposal. Explain the speaker’s opinion and reasons” 就可以省略第一步的表态 Practice 1 Campus fitness center to close Practice 2 Which do you prefer, playing individual sports or team sports? 我的理由 team sports make friends, same interests team work, skills for study and work 在 team work 展开时卡住，因为觉得 team sports 和 team work 重复了。可以说

item.title: Day 2
item.description: Practice 1 Do you prefer write by hand or type on a computer? 对于prefer的问题，用比较级可以说的更流畅，比如我的回答中 After we have practiced using the keyboard, it will become very fast to … eh … type on a computer, and will save a lot of time 可以说 it will become faster comparing with writing on paper Pracice 2 进入 Task 2 题目网址：engoo Changes to Be Made in Tomorrow’s Elections All students should be aware that there are two changes in tomorrow’s student council elections.

item.title: Day 1
item.description: Pracice 1 Some people believe that television has a negative impact on children and should be avoided. Others feel that television is one of many ways a child can learn. Which do you believe? 如果问选 A 还是选 B，可以同时站在 A 和 B 的角度答，在没思路的情况下是可以这样做的 I believe that television can have both positive and negative effects on children, so it should not be fully avoided, but instead, managed correctly. Pracice 2 Children should help their parents with household chores when they are old enough to do so.
